document_data.name: Protection from Cold
document_data.spheres2e: [[Elemental water sphere|Elemental Water]], [[Elemental air sphere|Elemental Air]], [[Protection sphere|Protection]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from cold''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[invocation]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Ulutiu]], enabling them to protect themselves or others from harsh cold.
document_data.Effects:
If the caster used this spell on themselves then they were granted complete immunity from frigid environments and cold-based attacks from magic and creatures. The spell would absorb a certain amount of energy from such attacks before ending.

If used on another target the spell would grant immunity to freezing environments and lessen the harm from cold-based attacks.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal component]]s and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the priest's [[holy symbol]] and a small piece of ice to cast.
